questions.question:
Refer to CAP 697, MEP, Fig 3.1.
A flight is to be made from an airfield (elevation 3000 ft) to another. The cruising level is FL120, temp ISA. The OAT at the departure airfield is +10째C, the wind component in the climb is +30 kt.
Calculate the fuel used, time and distance flown in the climb.
questions.explanation: This question requires reference to CAP 697 MEP, Figure 3.1 to calculate climb performance including fuel consumption, time, and distance (NGM - Nautical Ground Miles) for the specified departure elevation, cruise level, temperature conditions, and wind component.
